1.name: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
1.content: >One of the **biggest Student Run NGO's of India**, GYWS (expanding throughout the nation : **[LIGHT](http://light.gyws.org)** majorly functions in the Gopali area near IIT KGP providing quality education to the children of less priviledged sections of the society. Currently the Public Relations Officer here.

3.name: Team Kart
3.content: The **Formula Student** team of **IIT Kharagpur**. I was member of the **Suspension and Brakes** Team here.

4.name: Solar91
4.content: I was a Summer Intern here, gained knowledge on how a Solar EPC functions in the market and manages it's projects in brief.
